154 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
155 template <class T>
156 bool plSerializer::get_object(const std::string &name_obj, T &obj)
157 {
158  ObjectsMap::iterator obj_ptr;
159 
160  obj_ptr = objects_.find(name_obj);
161 
162  if (obj_ptr != objects_.end())
163  {
164  T* specialized = dynamic_cast<T*>(obj_ptr->second);
165  if (specialized)
166  {
167  obj = *specialized;
168  return true;
169  }
170  else return false;
171  }
172  else
173  {
174  return false;
175  }
176 }
177 
178 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
179 template <class T>
180 void plSerializer::get_objects_map(std::map<std::string, T*> & object_map)
181 {
182  ObjectsMap::const_iterator obj_ptr;
183 
184  object_map.clear();
185 
186  for (obj_ptr = objects_.begin(); obj_ptr != objects_.end(); ++obj_ptr)
187  {
188  T* specialized = dynamic_cast<T*>(obj_ptr->second);
189  if (specialized)
190  {
191  object_map[ obj_ptr->first ] = specialized;
192  }
193  }
194 }
195 
196 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
197 template <class T>
198 void plSerializer::get_objects_map(std::map<std::string,
199  const T*> & object_map) const
200 {
201  ObjectsMap::const_iterator obj_ptr;
202 
203  object_map.clear();
204 
205  for (obj_ptr = objects_.begin(); obj_ptr != objects_.end(); ++obj_ptr)
206  {
207  T* specialized = dynamic_cast<T*>(obj_ptr->second);
208  if (specialized)
209  {
210  object_map[ obj_ptr->first ] = specialized;
211  }
212  }
213 }
214 
215 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
216 template <class T>
217 void plSerializer::print_object_class_list(std::ostream& out, T* /* obj */,
218  const std::string &class_name) const
219 {
220  ObjectsMap::const_iterator obj_ptr;
221  unsigned int count;
222 
223  out << "---- " << class_name << " ----" << std::endl;
224  count = 0;
225  for (obj_ptr = objects_.begin(); obj_ptr != objects_.end(); ++obj_ptr)
226  {
227  if (dynamic_cast<T*>(obj_ptr->second))
228  {
229  out << obj_ptr->first << ": ";
230  pl_print_object_info(out, obj_ptr->second);
231  count++;
232  }
233  }
234  out << count <<" " << class_name << " registered." << std::endl << std::endl;
235 }
236 
237 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
238 template <class T>
239 void plSerializer::add_object(const std::string &name_obj, const T &obj)
240 {
241  ObjectsMap::iterator obj_ptr = objects_.find(name_obj);
242 
243  if(obj_ptr != objects_.end()){
244  delete obj_ptr->second;
245  }
246 
247  objects_[name_obj] = new T(obj);
248 }
